front.title: BGP AS_PATH Verification Based on Forwarding Commitment (FC) Objects

abstract.t: The Forwarding Commitment (FC) is an RPKI object that attests to the complete routing intents description which an Autonomous System (AS) would obey in Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) route propagation. This document specifies an FC-based AS Path Verification methodology to mitigate, even solve, AS Path forgery and route leaks. This document also explains the various BGP security threats that FC can help address and provides operational considerations associated with FC deployment.
